detail_desc: Joggers in patterned sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Coat in sturdy twill made from a viscose blend. Stand-up collar with concealed press-studs and a concealed zip down the front, welt side pockets, two inner pockets, and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Dungarees in soft, stretch cotton denim with hard-worn details. Adjustable straps, a chest pocket and front and back pockets, buttons at the sides and slim legs. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Short shorts in washed, slightly stretchy cotton denim. High waist with a V-shaped seam, zip fly and button and front and back pockets. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top.
Oversized blouse in softly draping twill made from a silk and cotton blend. Stand-up, gathered collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Dress in soft, crinkled cotton jersey with an elasticated, gathered yoke at the top and an opening and shimmering button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with a flounce over the shoulders. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes along the short sides.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
Cold shoulder top in a rib knit. Straight-cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Jeggings in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Knee-length dress in a soft knit containing some wool with a ribbed turtle neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal and plastic earrings in various designs. Length from 4.5 cm to 8 cm.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Folded, glued edge at the top and laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.

Set with a T-shirt, pair of shorts and sun hat in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt that is slightly longer and rounded at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Lined sun hat with ties under the chin.

Short dress in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace details, an opening at the back with crossover lacing and a concealed zip in one side. Long sleeves with a small opening and ties at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt with a scalloped lace trim at the hem. Partly lined.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Detachable, lined hood with a narrow elasticated edge, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Open poncho in an airy viscose weave with inset lace embroidery, a drawstring at the waist and slits in the sides.

Winter running jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with ribbed sections for increased mobility. Hood with narrow elastication around the edge, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Reflective details, a side pocket with a concealed zip, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Hat in a ribbed wool-blend knit containing some cashmere with a faux fur pompom on the top.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details. High waist with a wide, elasticated waistband. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
High-waisted trousers in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a linen and viscose weave. High, elasticated, drawstring waist with a frill trim, a fake fly, discreet pockets in the side seams and wide, tapered legs with creases.
Wide, V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket and gently rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Slip-on trainers with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Imitation cork insoles and textured rubber soles.
Hard smartphone case. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Ankle-length trousers in twill made from a viscose blend. High waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, a zip fly and button, and fake welt back pockets with a button. Wide, tapered legs with creases.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in patterned chiffon crêpe with elastication at the top, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with taped details and short raglan sleeves. Rounded and longer at the back.
Calf-length skirt in a double layer of sequined mesh with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and beaded fringe trim at the hem. Lined.

Blouse in airy, patterned crinkled chiffon with a small stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Double-layered yoke with a pleat at the back and gathers at the front of the shoulders. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a round neckline and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Yoke at the top with a flounced trim that continues back over the shoulders, and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a gathered seam at the hem. Jersey underdress with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short skirt in a sturdy, textured weave with fake welt pockets at the front and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.
Straight-cut top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a high, ribbed collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long, slightly wider sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Pockets in the side seams and straight legs with creases front and back.
Water bottle in patterned plastic with a glittery snap-on lid and spout and a practical carry strap. Capacity 450 ml.

V-neck playsuit in satin with a slight sheen. Opening and button at the back of the neck, cap sleeves and a seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and a detachable soft belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets and wide legs with pleats at the top. Unlined.
Patterned nightdress in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with narrow shoulder straps.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Fully lined bikini bottoms in scuba fabric with a low waist.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps and gathers at the top. Lined at the front. Bottoms with a frill and lined gusset.

Jumper in rib-knit cotton with a polo neck and long raglan sleeves. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Elasticated plastic necklaces, one with faceted plastic beads.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and short slits in the sides. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a rounded hem. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and gathered seam down the back and sleeves. Flap side pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sequin-embroidered dress in tulle with an opening and button at the back of the neck, short butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a sturdy cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and flap leg pockets with a hook and loop fastener.
Knee-length football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs.
Top in soft pile with an embroidered appliqué on the front and a concealed press-stud at the back. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long dress in EcoNyl® with organic cotton embroidery in a narrow cut at the top with a double flounce around the neckline and covered buttons down the back. The dress is fitted and flares to the hem with inset panels for added width. Recycled polyester lining.
Bras in cotton jersey and lace with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Dance shoes with elastic straps over the foot. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Long jacket in jersey with narrow notch lapels and front pockets. Unlined.
Top in a soft, ribbed viscose blend with a deep neckline, decorative buttons at the front and short sleeves.
Soft cotton jersey leggings in different designs with an elasticated waist.
Sandals with crossover straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Trousers in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt that is longer at the back. Lined.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Plastic Alice bands in the shape of cat ears.
Short-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
